name: Support.com, Inc.
description: Support.com, Inc. is a leading provider of technology support services and software solutions, specializing in delivering high-quality customer service and technical support for various digital products. Founded in 1997, Support.com has built a reputation for excellence in helping consumers and businesses navigate the complexities of technology. The company offers a suite of services including device setup, troubleshooting, and ongoing support for a wide range of devices, from computers and smartphones to smart home products. With a focus on enhancing customer experiences, Support.com utilizes advanced technology and a team of skilled professionals to provide timely and effective support. The company's proprietary software solutions also empower businesses to deliver efficient customer service, manage workflows, and track support metrics. As the digital landscape continues to evolve, Support.com remains committed to innovation, leveraging its expertise to adapt to changing consumer needs and technological advancements. The company's mission is to be the trusted partner for all technology support needs, ensuring that users can maximize their technology investments without frustration.

seo.meta_title: Support.com, Inc. | Leading Technology Support Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Support.com, Inc., a top provider of technology support services and software solutions. Explore our offerings and commitment to enhancing customer experiences.

faq.question: What services does Support.com provide?
faq.answer: Support.com provides technical support services for consumers and businesses, including device setup and troubleshooting.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Support.com?
faq.answer: Elizabeth H. Sturman is the CEO of Support.com, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Support.com headquartered?
faq.answer: Support.com is headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, USA.

faq.question: What are Support.com's main products?
faq.answer: Support.com's main products include Home Tech Support, Business Tech Support, and various software solutions.
